header.title: User Blog Mod
header.description: Adds Blogs to a phpBB3 board.
header.author-notes: PHP versions less than 5.1.0 are NOT supported. Please report any bugs/problems at my website: http://www.lithiumstudios.org. The SVN repository for this project is: http://userblogmod.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ You may check for updated code in the repository, but the latest files in the repository may be broken and have major errors.

changelog.change: A few bug fixes. subsilver2 style is now included. To update, upload the new files and point your browser to blog.php?page=update
More bug fixes plus a much more secure Blog CSS filter. To update from Beta 1, redo the edits to viewtopic.php, upload all of the new files, and run the upgrade script at blog.php?page=update.

Adding an automatic version checker. Cleaning up the language files, removing unused keys, plus renaming blogs to blog entries. To update from Beta 2, upload all of the new files, then run the upgrade script at blog.php?page=update.

Bug fixing. Some fixes with the converter, language fixes, and other misc bugs fixed. Now the blog category counts the number of blogs under it and it's subcategories. To update from Beta 3, upload all of the new files, then run the upgrade script at blog.php?page=update.
A few more bug fixes that were introduced by fixing some bugs the last time. To update from Beta 4, upload all of the new files, then run the upgrade script at blog.php?page=update.
